Package x10.matrix.comm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommHandle
    This class includes p2p, bcast, ring cast, gather, scatter, and reduce sum operations for distributed matrices.
    RequestHandleMPI
    MatrixScatter
    This class provide scatter communication for distributed matrix.
    DenseRemoteSourceInfo
    This struct is used to pack information of sparse matrix from the source place.
    ArrayBcast
    This class broadcasts data in double-precision or CompressArray to all places Two implementations are available, using MPI routines and X10 remote array copy.
    ArrayScatter
    This class supports scatter operation for data arrays which are defined in PlaceLocalHandle and DistArray at all places.
    MatrixRingCast
    Ring cast sends data from here to a number of places .
    WrapMPI
    MatrixReduce
    The class provides reduce-sum communication for distributed matrix, This operation adds matrix blocks from all places and stores result in dense format at here, using provided temporary dense matrix blocks space to receive data.
    SparseRemoteSourceInfo
    This struct is used to pack information of sparse matrix from the source place.
    MatrixBcast
    This class provides broadcast functions for dense and sparse matrices.
    ArrayReduce
    This class provides implementation for reduce-sum operation for data arrays which can be accessed via PlaceLocalHandle or DistArray structure in all places.
    ArrayRcast
    Ring cast, similar to broadcast, sends data to selected places, while using place-to-place communication without optimization on its broadcast route.
    MatrixGather
    This class provide gather communication for distributed matrix.
    ArrayGather
    Gather operations collects data arrays distributed in all places to root.
    ArrayRemoteCopy
    This class supports inter-place communication for data arrays which are defined in PlaceLocalHandle and DistArray at all places.
    SparseRemoteDestInfo
    This struct is used to pack information of sparse matrix from the destination place.
    MatrixRemoteCopy
    This class transfers matrix data across different places.
